scripts.create-user: cd C:/Program Files/PostgreSQL/13/bin && createuser -U postgres -s billinguser
scripts.change-password: psql -U postgres -d template1 -c "ALTER ROLE billinguser WITH PASSWORD 'password';"
scripts.create-db: cd C:/Program Files/PostgreSQL/13/bin && createdb -U billinguser -p 5432 billingdb
